弣字的基本解释

弣
fǔ
弓把中部：“有司左执弣，右执弦而授弓。”

弣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fǔ］
［《廣韻》芳武切，上麌，敷。］
(1)弓把中部。
(2)泛指弓把。

弣字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　弣； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页357第26
【廣韻】芳武切【集韻】【韻會】斐父切，?音撫。【釋名】弓中央曰弣。弣，撫也。人所持撫也。【廣韻】弣，弓弝中也。【禮·曲禮】左手承弣。

弣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
弣字的起名意思

暂无。

handle of bow
Basic explanation of words
handle of bow
fǔ
The middle part of the bow: "There is a division who holds the left hand, and the right holds the string to give the bow."
handle of bow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [fǔ]
["Guangyun" Fangwu cut, upper head, apply. ]
(1) The middle part of the bow.
(2) Refers to the bow in general.
handle of bow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Jixia] [Bow Character Department] 　弣; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 357 26
[Guang Yun] Fang Wuqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Fei father cut,? Yin caress. [Release name] The center of the bow said Bi. Bie, Fu Ye. People are also holding caress. [Guang Yun] Bi, Gong Bi Zhong Ye. 【Li·Chu Li】Chengbi with the left hand.
